requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a client library written in Python using XmlRpc.

description.p: You find the python client code in the directory xmlBlaster/src/python. Please use the file pyBlaster.py which provides access to xmlBlaster in an easy and even interactive way.

ul.li: for connecting read the connect interface
for disconnecting read the disconnect interface
for erasing read the erase interface
for getting read the get interface
for publishing read the publish interface
for subscribing read the subscribe interface
for unsubscribing read the unSubscribe interface
for callbacks read the update interface
